医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了自然界中一系列令人震惊的未经探索的蛋白质折叠一项开创性的研究为自然界中蛋白质结构及其折叠的惊人多样性提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Study-unveils-an-astounding-array-of-unexplored- Protein-folds-in-nature.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Study-unveils-an-astounding-array-of-unexplored- Protein-folds-in-nature.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=010f3923-a026-4dbb-80df-f37daf71da68 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 00:11:14 -0400 Study unveils an astounding array of unexplored protein folds in nature
研究人员开发3D生物打印技术消除癌细胞全球首次开发出能够利用免疫细胞功能消除癌细胞的三维（3D）生物打印技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Researchers-develop-3D-bioprinting-technology-for-elimination-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Researchers-develop-3D-bioprinting-technology-for-elimination-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4de3c875-341f-444b-a011-531678ab1a7e Tue, 11 Jul 2023 23:19:00 -0400 Researchers develop 3D bioprinting technology for eliminating cancer cells
研究发现许多林奇综合征患者仍未确诊雪松-西奈癌症研究人员的新研究可能需要重新考虑当前的筛查指南，以纳入林奇综合征的一个尚未被充分认识的病因，林奇综合征是遗传性结直肠癌和子宫内膜癌的最常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Many-病人-with-Lynch-syndrome-remain-undiagnosed-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Many-病人-with-Lynch-syndrome-remain-undiagnosed-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91deff34-08e7-4916-b7da-11a1d8c46685 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 23:16:12 -0400 Many patients with Lynch syndrome remain undiagnosed, study finds
Hutchinson-Gilford 早衰症小鼠模型显示肝脏 H2S 水平降低一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 12 期，题为“Hepatic Hydrogen sulfidelevels are lowered in mouse”哈钦森-吉尔福德早衰综合症模型。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Mouse-model-of-Hutchinson-Gilford-progeria-syndrome-shows-reduction-in-hepatic-H2S-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Mouse-model-of-Hutchinson-Gilford-progeria-syndrome-shows-reduction-in-hepatic-H2S-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=250e0402-f473-43f0-aed9-21c6716dbf51 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 23:10:02 -0400 Mouse model of Hutchinson-Gilford progeria syndrome shows reduction in hepatic H2S levels
脂联素可能是肥胖和糖尿病的潜在治疗靶点脂联素是一种由脂肪组织分泌的激素，在保护胰腺功能方面发挥着双重重要作用：在瘦人中，它可以保护产生胰岛素的β细胞，而在肥胖者中，它可以逆转脂肪组织的损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Adiponectin-can-be-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-for-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Adiponectin-can-be-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-for-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b63ed086-96e8-4f76-86b4-e16e6a4ddb24 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 22:52:15 -0400 Adiponectin can be a potential therapeutic target for obesity and diabetes
埃默里大学、佐治亚理工学院的研究人员探索人工智能如何增加获得 COVID-19 治疗的机会为了解决医疗保健服务中出现的新问题，埃默里大学医学院和佐治亚理工学院的研究人员正在探索人工智能 (AI) 如何提供一种提高诊断和治疗效率的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Emory-Georgia-Tech-researchers-explore-how-AI-can-increase-access-to-COVID-19-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Emory-Georgia-Tech-researchers-explore-how-AI-can-increase-access-to-COVID-19-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51c82253-b9b0-40c8-9d79-9fa1edebc589 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 22:36:19 -0400 Emory, Georgia Tech researchers explore how AI can increase access to COVID-19 treatment
新研究发现非裔美国人中慢性阻塞性肺病的诊断存在差距最近发表的研究表明，尽管表现出明显的慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD）症状，但由于诊断方法的缺陷，许多非裔美国人并未被正式诊断出患有该疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/New-research-finds-COPD-diagnosis-gap-in-African-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/New-research-finds-COPD-diagnosis-gap-in-African-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b05b304-8220-4a0e-acbb-9749006cd935 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 21:03:06 -0400 New research finds COPD diagnosis gap in African Americans
化疗引起的肠道细菌变化与乳腺癌患者不健康的体重增加有关研究人员发现化疗引起的肠道细菌变化与乳腺癌患者不健康的体重增加之间存在联系，这为潜在帮助幸存者在以后的生活中避免与肥胖相关的疾病指明了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Chemotherapy-induced-changes-to-gut-bacteria-linked-to-unhealthy-weight-gain-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Chemotherapy-induced-changes-to-gut-bacteria-linked-to-unhealthy-weight-gain-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d338680a-a606-4b59-a8f6-f067f4e487b1 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 20:57:02 -0400 Chemotherapy-induced changes to gut bacteria linked to unhealthy weight gain in breast cancer patients
重新思考如何提供癌症免疫治疗药物可以挽救数百万人的生命一项新的分析发现，通过重新考虑如何提供这些药物，退伍军人健康管理局每年可以节省高达数百万美元的癌症免疫治疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Rethinking-how-cancer-immunotherapy-drugs-are-delivered-could-save-millions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Rethinking-how-cancer-immunotherapy-drugs-are-delivered-could-save-millions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caaf05a6-7239-4611-a663-2c3c087abc31 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 20:49:19 -0400 Rethinking how cancer immunotherapy drugs are delivered could save millions
美国农业部科学家制定健康菜单，其中 91% 的卡路里来自超加工食品美国农业部农业研究局 (ARS) 大福克斯人类营养研究中心的科学家领导的一项研究表明，建立 91% 的卡路里来自超加工食品（使用 NOVA 量表分类）的健康饮食是可能的，同时仍然遵循 2020-2025 年美国人膳食指南 (DGA) 的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/USDA-scientists-create-healthy-menu-with-9125-of-calories-coming-from-ultra-processed-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/USDA-scientists-create-healthy-menu-with-9125-of-calories-coming-from-ultra-processed-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e54696f-b662-48cf-a3c9-70d21a4d583c Tue, 11 Jul 2023 20:46:13 -0400 USDA scientists create healthy menu with 91% of calories coming from ultra-processed foods
